name: Flow Alteration Module
functionStatement: Integrates the range of "typical" flows experienced by other processes. Examines the degree to which upstream infrastructure or land uses have fundamentally altered flow regimes (e.g., hydropeaking, dams, withdrawals).
descriptionMarkdown: Composite indicator of departure from natural flow timing, magnitude, and variability due to regulation, withdrawals, or land use.
howToMeasureMarkdown: Compile daily discharge (or model outputs). Calculate the module score per SQT guidance (often based on multiple IHA-style metrics).

inputs.label: Flow Alteration Module
inputs.helpMarkdown: Hydrologic alteration model outputs and/or gage-based IHA/flow statistics.

references: USGS NWIS daily discharge where available
